backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing players and duels with creation, updates, bet validation, and match completion logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend React components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file bootstrapping the React app by loading main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with five routes and wraps them in the AppLayout component.
frontend/src/components/ActiveDuelCard.t: UI card showing details of the active duel, including players, bet visibility logic, and match completion controls.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: App-wide layout providing banner, logo, navigation tabs, and a global error banner wrapper for all routes.
frontend/src/components/DuelForm.tsx: Form for creating duels, selecting players, validating bets, and triggering random duel generation.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBanne: Displays a global error message with a retry button that refreshes the page.
frontend/src/components/MatchCompletionC: UI controls to declare a duel winner with confirmation dialogs and completion mutation.
frontend/src/components/MatchHistoryList: Renders a table of completed duels showing players, bets, mode, winner, and hearts transferred.
frontend/src/components/PlayerList.tsx: Displays a table of players with stats, rank, status, and optional removal actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor based on identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlobalInitAndQuery: Aggregates global initialization and query errors for actor, players, and duels.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating players and duels using an actor, with cache invalidation on updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables, themes, and utility classes for styling, including pixel and Minecraft-inspired UI elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays overall statistics for players and duels using fetched data and computed stats.
frontend/src/pages/DuelPage.tsx: Shows the most recent pending duel and provides a form to create new duels.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Lists completed duels in reverse chronological order using MatchHistoryList.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Renders the player leaderboard sorted by hearts, wins, and name.
frontend/src/pages/PlayersPage.tsx: Provides UI to add and remove players and displays the full player list.
frontend/src/utils/leaderboard.ts: Sorts players for leaderboard display using hearts, wins, and name tie-breakers.
frontend/src/utils/stats.ts: Computes summary statistics from players and duels, including leaders and totals.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Includes Vite type definitions for the project.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, custom colors, animations, shadows, and fonts using multiple plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the appâ€™s purpose, architecture notes, known issues, and a list of existing frontend feature requirements.
